'''1.8.13'''<ref name=mcnet>{{mcnet|new-nintendo-3ds-edition-updated|New Nintendo 3DS Edition Updated!|November 20, 2018|Staff}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360020066051|title=Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition - 1.8|date=November 21, 2018}}</ref> is an update for the {{el|ds}} released on November 20–21, 2018, which added new downloadable content and fixed bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
New DLC available for purchase:
* Steam Punk Texture Pack
* [[Strangers - Biome Settlers 3]]
* [[Moana Character Pack]]
* [[Mighty Morphin Power Rangers]] skin pack
* [[Magic: The Gathering Skin Pack]]
* [[Halloween Costumes Skin Pack]]
* [[Festive Mash-up]] 2016

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Improved stability and performance.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug where the player could sprint while [[Bed#Sleeping|sleeping]] in a [[bed]].
* Numerous bug fixes from previous builds.
